name: Heated World
desc: With no star to provide light and heat to $market
icon: Halo Dynamics built large planetary-scale heating networks to compensate. Fuel demand is increased.

name: Siren Song
desc: $market appears to be home to some unusual and powerful natives...

name: Melting Ice
desc: $market is home to natives with minimal interaction with the outside world.

name: Ocean Tears
desc: The mermaids of $market are now part of the greater galaxy, striving to bring joy to this dim corner of the stars.
